maqras.text: 78|4|geuleohji anhnola. geudeul-eun god alge doel geos-ila
78|5|dasi hanbeon, geuleohji anhnola. geudeul-eun god alge doel geos-ila
78|12|geuligo geudaedeul wie ilgob gaeui ganghan geos(haneul)eul jieoss-eumyeo
78|14|geuligo bisbang-ul-eul jjanaeneun guleum-eseo peobusneun bileul naelyeoss-euni
78|18|geunal napal-i bullimyeon geudaedeul-eun ttejieo ol geos-imyeo
78|24|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo siwonhamdo, eumlyodo masboji moshal geos-ini
78|30|geuleoni neohuineun masbola, naega neohuiege jeung-gasikil geos-eun ojig beol ppun-ila
78|31|sillo (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-egeneun seong-gong-ui jangsoga jueojil geos-ini
78|35|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo sil-eobsneun maldo, geojismaldo deudji anh-eul geos-ila
78|37|haneulgwa daeji geuligo geu saie jonjaehaneun geos-ui junim, gajang jabilousin bun-egeseo on geos-ila. geudeul-eun geubunkke gwanhayeo eotteohan bal-eongwondo gaj-ji moshal geos-ila

78|38|yeonghon(gabeuliel cheonsa)gwa cheonsadeul-i daeyeol-eul jieo seoneun geunal geudeul-eun mal-eul haji moshal geos-ina, gajang jabilousin bunkkeseo heolaghasin janeun ye-oelo geuneun jinsil-eul malhal geos-ila
78|39|igeos-iyamallo jinliui nal-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo gwichagjileul dula

78|40|sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege gakkaun beol-eul gyeong-gohayeossnola. geunal ingan-eun jasin-ui du son-i naenoh-eun geos-eul bol geos-imyeo bulsinjaneun “naega heulg-ieossdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!” ilago malhage doel geos-ila
79|10|geudeul-i malhani “jinsillo uliga ijeon sangtaelo doedol-agandan mal-inga?”
79|14|bola, ije geudeul-eun wongi gadeughan daeji wie issnola
79|16|geuui junimkkeseo seongseuleoun goljjagiin ‘ttuwa’ eseo geuleul bulleossnola
79|17|“geudaeneun palao-egelo gala, sillo geuneun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseossnola”
79|19|“ ‘naega geudaeleul geudae junim-eulo indohalyeo hani, geuleohge geudaeneun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehage doel geos-ila’ “
79|20|geu hu geu(mose)neun geu(palao)ege eomahan jingpyoleul boyeojueoss-euna
79|24|geu hu geuga malhagil “jim-eun geudaedeul-ui gajang jigohan junim-ila”
79|25|geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun naesewa hyeonse-ui jing-gyeloseo geuleul umkyeojab-eusyeossnola
79|26|jinsillo igeos-eneun dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyohun-i issnola
79|27|changjoga deo eolyeoun geos-eun geudaedeul-inga animyeon haneul-inga? geubunkkeseo geugeos(haneul)eul jieusyeossnola
79|28|geubunkkeseoneun geugeos(haneul)ui kkogdaegileul ollisyeossgo geu hu geugeos-eul gyundeunghage dusyeoss-eumyeo
79|29|geugeos-ui bam-eul eodubge hasyeossgo geugeos-ui achimbich-eul naesyeossnola
79|39|sillo taoleuneun buljiog, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
79|40|geuleona jasin-ui junim ap-e seoneun il-eul dulyeowohamyeo jasin-ui yogguleul jeoljehadeon janeun
79|42|geudeul-i geudae(muhammadeu)ege jongmal-ui sigan-e gwanhae mul-euni “geugeos-eun eonje gaesidoendan mal-inga?”
79|43|geugeos(gaesi sigan)ui eongeub-e gwanhayeo geudaega eotteon gwanlyeon-i issdan mal-inga
79|45|geudaeneun ojig geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyeong-gojail ppun-ila
79|46|geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul boneun nal geudeul-eun machi (hyeonseeseo) ohuna achimnajeolman-eul meomulleossda saeng-gaghal geos-ila
